name: requirejs-esm-converter
description: Converts source RequireJS modules from AMD to ESM format.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com>

scripts.cover: c8 node test && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -h && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -V && cat test/input/amd-object.js | c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js && cat test/input/esm.js | c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -d test/input/amd-main.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -p test/input/esm.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js test/input/invalid.txt && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -X || c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -D -P "none/*.js" || c8 report -r text -r lcov
scripts.test: denolint && c8 node test && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -h && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -V && cat test/input/amd-object.js | c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js && cat test/input/esm.js | c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -d test/input/amd-main.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -p test/input/esm.js && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js test/input/invalid.txt && c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -X || c8 --no-clean ./bin/requirejs-to-esm.js -D -P "none/*.js" || c8 report -r text -r lcov
